result.arabic_text: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَقُولُ ٱئۡذَن لِّي وَلَا تَفۡتِنِّيٓۚ أَلَا فِي ٱلۡفِتۡنَةِ سَقَطُواْۗ وَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمُحِيطَةُۢ بِٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
result.translation: 49. Nabiyow ama munaafiqhiinik jihaadak Raaqamkeh idini yoh acuy agabuu kee maali fitnatat yoo maqidin kok iyya num keenit yan, Oobbiyainummah ama munaafiqhiin kaxxa fitnatat raddeeh, koroositteh gaaduk raqteemih sabbatah, diggah jahannam gira koroosite marat maroh tan.
